page.title: 05 (Un)Employment in Banbury
page.content: The figures for unemployment in Banbury plus a ten mile radius for June 1985 are: males 11.3% (1727) and females 9.3% (1065) - which equals 2,792 men and women. The figures of employment in the same area are: males 15,304 and females 11,400, which equals 23,920 men and women that are employed in Banbury plus a ten mile radius. The main suppliers of jobs in Banbury are General Foods (1900 workers), Alcan (950 workers), Automomotive Products (640 workers) - but that is closing down - the hospital (600 workers) and local government (500 workers). The overall population of Banbury and a ten mile radius is about 35,000 men, women and children. We got our information by ringing the Job Centre.
